channel.title: ALRIGHT.. PISSING ME OFF LOL. Need Skillcape to req. SKILLS
channel.description:
OK. Its me again.
Im trying to get this code to make it so you need 99 to wear a attack cape:
[code] if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14073) {// Evan`
if (playerLevel[0] <= 98 && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14073) { // If you are lvl 98 or lower you cannot wear cape! remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], 1); sendMessage("You Need 99 attack To Wear This Cape!"); } [/code]
I was thinking of removing the [code] if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14073) {// Evan` [/code]
Would that ruin it..?
Help is appreciated!

@Morgarath wrote:

EDIT: What I was thinking didnt work, lol :p[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2008, 02:34:35 PM[/size][hr]I did. It took it off for a second, but then you can just put it back on.
